title: What is training?
content: Training is a process to build skills.

title: What is mentorship?
content: Mentorship involves guidance by a more experienced person.

title: How does training work?
content: Training involves practical and theoretical learning.

title: Why choose consultation?
content: Consultation can provide tailored advice and strategies.

title: What is the duration of training?
Benefits of mentorship?
content: Mentorship helps in career growth and personal development.

title: What fields offer consultation?
content: Consultation is available in various fields like business, healthcare.

title: How to become a mentor?
content: To become a mentor, one should have significant experience and willingness to guide others.
